data.name: The Beresford family
data.detailed_description:
The corpse of little Matilda Beresford was found in the basement of the Beresford mansion the night of July 20, 1824.

His father, Robert Beresford, and a local detective, Mr. Cooper, investigated her death, in an attempt to clarify what happened that night. The only person who could clear up the mystery is Victoria Beresford, the youngest of children. But she didn't seem to remember anything about the accident and what happened. What valuable information could a 5-year-old girl have?

Discover the tragedy of the Beresford family, a cursed place and cursed family from that dark night of 1824. A curse that continues to our days...

FEATURES


  • Animated backgrounds, CGs and sprites.
  • Dynamic background music according to events.
  • Intense horror novel with many events to discover.
  • More than 15 characters to meet and investigate. No one is beyond suspicion.
  • A mansion. Two spaces. What happens in the other dimension?
  • Dialogues with different choices.
  • Make your own decisions to reach your own end. Will you discover the truth?
